message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking $200 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $170. This product is really top-notch and I'm confident you'll find it worth the value.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. Can you consider $140? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
